channel.title: Data Science Hub for R developers
channel.description: Recent content on Data Science Hub for R developers

item.title: Data Science Hub for R Developers
item.description: Purpose of this site: R을 통계프로그램이 아니라 재현가능 연구(Reproducible Research) 및 업무자동화를 위한 개발툴로 활용하며, rmarkdown, shiny 등을 활용한 리포팅, 인터렉티브

item.title: Course Initiated
item.description: 이번 과정을 만드는 이유 Big Data Analytic with R 과정 개발을 시작합니다.

item.title: Data Science Hub opened
item.description: Data Science Hub is finally opened I start to develop the course titled “Data Science with R”. At this moment, this is mainly for the Bank of Korea(BOK) staff who are interested in Data Science. However, in the future, I will open this course to the public. Dookyung Kim
